p:
The most abundant plant phytosterols are sitosterol, campesterol and stigmasterol [ 41]. The total phytosterol concentrations of the studied samples were 17.09 and 436.37 mg/100g for pulp and seed oils, respectively (Table
3 ). Seed sample was more concentrated in all the plant sterols than the pulp oil. The RSD varied from 24.90 to 98.46.
